title: La silla rota del Airbnb
titleTranslation: The broken chair at the Airbnb

thumbnail.generation_prompt: Two friends with backpacks walking in a Spanish city street, buildings.

tags.name: Grammar
tags.description: Past narrative (pretérito, imperfecto, pluscuamperfecto), subjunctive (para que), relative clauses

tags.name: Vocabulary
tags.description: Travel, accommodation, hostels, damages, negotiation, splitting costs

tags.name: Themes
tags.description: Post-COVID travel, friendship, house parties, responsibility, paying for damages

content.text: En 2021, justo después del COVID, viajé un mes por España con un amigo.
content.translation: In 2021, right after COVID, I travelled around Spain for a month with a friend.
detailedTranslation: justo después de — right after
viajé — I travelled; infinitive viajar, 1st person pretérito
por España — around Spain

content.text: Entre semana trabajábamos a distancia; los fines de semana reservábamos hostales para conocer gente.
content.translation: On weekdays we worked remotely; at weekends we booked hostels to meet people.
detailedTranslation: Entre semana — on weekdays
trabajábamos — we worked; infinitive trabajar, imperfect
a distancia — remotely
reservábamos — we booked; infinitive reservar, imperfect

content.text: Conocimos a mucha gente interesante con la que pasamos muy buen rato.
content.translation: We met a lot of interesting people with whom we had a great time.
detailedTranslation: Conocimos — we met; infinitive conocer, 1st person plural pretérito
con la que — with whom (relative)

content.generation_prompt: Two friends with backpacks walking in a Spanish city, buildings in the background.

content.text: Uno de ellos era Giuseppe, un italiano muy simpático.
content.translation: One of them was Giuseppe, a very nice Italian guy.
detailedTranslation: era — was; infinitive ser, imperfect

content.text: Un día decidimos hacer una fiesta en el Airbnb donde nos alojábamos.
content.translation: One day we decided to throw a party at the Airbnb where we were staying.
detailedTranslation: decidimos — we decided; infinitive decidir, pretérito
donde — where (relative)

content.text: Invitamos a varios amigos que habíamos conocido en los hostales.
content.translation: We invited several friends we had met at the hostels.
detailedTranslation: habíamos conocido — we had met; pluscuamperfecto of conocer

content.text: Compramos bebidas, hablamos mucho, nada del otro mundo.
content.translation: We bought drinks, talked a lot, nothing crazy.
detailedTranslation: nada del otro mundo — nothing crazy, nothing out of the ordinary

content.text: El piso no era tan pequeño, así que no estábamos pendientes de todo lo que pasaba.
content.translation: The flat wasn't that small, so we weren't always watching everything that was going on.
detailedTranslation: así que — so that
pendientes de — paying attention to, watching

content.generation_prompt: Group of friends in a living room, one person sitting on a chair in a slightly odd way.

content.text: Cuando nos fuimos, el dueño del Airbnb nos escribió pidiendo cien euros por daños.
content.translation: When we left, the Airbnb host wrote to us asking for a hundred euros for damages.
detailedTranslation: nos fuimos — we left; irse, pretérito
pidiendo — asking; gerund of pedir

content.text: Nos envió una foto de una silla rota.
content.translation: He sent us a photo of a broken chair.
detailedTranslation: envió — he sent; infinitive enviar, 3rd person pretérito

content.text: Mi amigo y yo sabíamos con certeza quién había sido: Giuseppe.
content.translation: My friend and I knew for sure who it had been: Giuseppe.
detailedTranslation: sabíamos — we knew; saber, imperfect
había sido — it had been; pluscuamperfecto of ser

content.text: En un momento de la noche había cambiado la silla de forma discreta para que no nos diéramos cuenta.
content.translation: At some point during the night he had swapped the chair in a discreet way so that we wouldn't notice.
detailedTranslation: había cambiado — he had changed/swapped; pluscuamperfecto of cambiar
para que no nos diéramos cuenta — so that we wouldn't notice; subjunctive

content.text: No habíamos visto nada, pero después lo supimos.
content.translation: We hadn't seen anything, but we found out afterwards.
detailedTranslation: habíamos visto — we had seen; pluscuamperfecto of ver
lo supimos — we found out (about it); saber, pretérito

content.generation_prompt: Two friends standing together looking at an Airbnb host or landlord with a sheepish or oopsie expression.

content.text: Al final negociamos el precio de los daños con el dueño.
content.translation: In the end we negotiated the cost of the damages with the host.
detailedTranslation: negociamos — we negotiated; infinitive negociar, pretérito

content.text: Logramos bajar un poco la cantidad.
content.translation: We managed to bring the amount down a bit.
detailedTranslation: Logramos — we managed; infinitive lograr, pretérito
bajar — to lower, bring down (infinitive)

content.text: Mi amigo y yo nos repartimos el pago a medias.
content.translation: My friend and I split the payment fifty-fifty.
detailedTranslation: repartimos — we split; infinitive repartir, pretérito
a medias — half and half, fifty-fifty

content.text: Fue una pena, pero así fue.
content.translation: It was a shame, but that's how it went.
detailedTranslation: Fue una pena — It was a shame; ser, pretérito

entre semana.explanation: Fixed expression; opposite of fin de semana.

fin de semana.explanation: Literally 'end of the week'; los fines de semana = at weekends.

buen rato.explanation: Pasamos buen rato = we had a good time.

alojarse.explanation: Reflexive; nos alojábamos = we were staying.

nada del otro mundo.explanation: Idiom: nothing out of the ordinary.

estar pendiente.explanation: Estar pendiente de algo = to watch out for / be aware of something.

dueño.explanation: El dueño del Airbnb = the Airbnb host/owner.

daños.explanation: Plural noun; por daños = for damages.

saber con certeza.explanation: Sabíamos con certeza = we knew for sure.

discreto.explanation: De forma discreta = in a discreet way.

darse cuenta.explanation: Reflexive; no nos diéramos cuenta = so we wouldn't notice.

saberlo.explanation: Lo supimos = we found out (about it).

lograr.explanation: Logramos + infinitive = we managed to do something.

repartir.explanation: Repartirse el pago = to split the payment.

a medias.explanation: Adverbial phrase; pagar a medias = to split the cost.

ser una pena.explanation: Fue una pena = It was a shame.
